newsitem.title: USA: Griffon Corp unit to buy Holmes-Hally.
newsitem.headline: Griffon Corp unit to buy Holmes-Hally.

text.p: Griffon Corp said on Wednesday that its Clopay Corp building products unit agreed to acquire Holmes-Hally Industries.
Holmes-Hally makes and installs residential garage doors. It has annual sales of about $80 million, with plants in California, Washington State and Arizona, Griffon said in a news release.
Griffon makes residential garage doors, commercial and industrial garage doors and related products, as well as specialty plastic films and information and communications systems.
Griffon shares closed up 3/8 to 13-7/8 on Wednesday.
